title: (x) Meriva - Opel custom typeface {Fabio Augusto}
content:
The Meriva's background is AC Milan soccer team t-shirt, and this the name for an Opel car in Italy. I found their site and It looks they are using lower case of the same font, I don't know the name but I hope it helps.   
   
 [http://www.thechallenge.it/concorso.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20051125213422/http:/www.thechallenge.it/concorso.php)   
 [http://www.soccerstore.com/shopping/product295.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20051125213422/http:/www.soccerstore.com/shopping/product295.html)   
   
\*\* Alonso #1 !!
author: Ignacio

comments.content:
The typeface show in the site is a custom   
design produced by Robin Nicholas   
in Monotype UK!   
   
This project is explaned in one article, here:   
   
 [http://www.agfamonotype.co.uk/DynamicPage/View.cfm?PageName=opel1](http://web.archive.org/web/20051125213422/http:/www.agfamonotype.co.uk/DynamicPage/View.cfm?PageName=opel1)   
   
Probably, the "Meriva" is a Narrow version of these (narrower version of the typeface, for use particularly in large sizes, in advertising and display work)
